name: Last Time in New York
writer: Carter Bays (creator), Craig Thomas (creator), Craig Gerard, Matthew Zinman
actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders, Cristin Milioti
plot: Barney and Robin try to have sex before the elderly wedding guests arrive, Ted reveals a list to Lily of things to do before he leaves New York, and Marshall has problems traveling through Packer Country.
